sdg-PD_AGR_LSFP-MALE.def: The indicator refers to the value of production per labour unit operated by small scale producers in the farming, pastoral and forestry sectors. Data will be produced by classes of enterprise size.
sdg-PD_AGR_LSFP-MALE.name: Productivity of large-scale food producers (agricultural output per labour day, PPP) (constant 2011 international $)
